tare.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: the weight of the materials in which goods are packed
tare.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: the weight of an unloaded vehicle, used to calculate the actual weight of the goods in it
tare.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: the weight of the material in which goods are packed or wrapped
tare.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: the weight of an unloaded goods vehicle, taken away from its loaded weight to calculate the weight of the goods it is carrying
tare.translation[1].definitions[1].examp: Truck drivers must keep their own records of tare weighings carried out.
